welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Madison Heights, a charming city known for its friendly locals and scenic surroundings. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that this lively city has to offer. Have a wonderful stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for regional flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Selfridge ANGB Airport serves both commercial and military flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Selfridge ANGB Airport is used for military operations and personnel.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all commercial flights at Pontiac Airport.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is reserved for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: McNamara Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Detroit Metropolitan Wayne County Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Detroit Metropolitan Wayne County Airport, primarily serving low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport by connecting to the designated network.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Willow Run Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Willow Run Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
